sec.p:
To test differences between gradual thaw and abrupt thaw net ecosystem exchange (Fig. 2b) we used the two-sided Kolmogorov-Smirnov test. We used this test also to compare radiocarbon ages of permafrost soil carbon respiration in gradual thaw versus abrupt thaw environments (Fig. 2c) Radiocarbon statistical analysis was performed on percent modern carbon data. All statistical analyses were performed in R
88 .
